title: Corporatist groups have formal ties to state

content.question: A corporatist political system is one in which

choices.label: major industries dominate politics through campaign contributions
schools incorporate political socialization directly into the curriculum
formal relationships exist between the government and recognized interest groups
labor unions own and manage large public enterprises
the executive branch is advised by experts sympathetic to business interests

content.answer: formal relationships exist between the government and recognized interest groups

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
